instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 No video
threads.message:
Working on a 820-00165 and cant figure out why im not getting video.

No sign of waterdamage, clean and nice

Starts up but no chime and no video

Backlight working and test with mouse lights up. 

SMC_LID 3.4v
EDP_PANEL_PWR 3.3v
PPVCC_S0_CPU 1.8v
P3V3_S0SW_LCD 3.28v

threads.title: 820-00165 No video
threads.message: Tried known good screen? Tried unplugging the SSD to see if you get a ? Folder?

threads.title: 820-00165 No video
threads.message:
Also try external video.
Disconnect LIO flex and test USB OSX with LED Link on MLB USB port (internal SSD removed).
Try known good and compatible screen for this model too.
Use correct Magsafe 2 charger.

threads.title: 820-00165 No video
threads.message:
Of coarse I tried known good screen and without ssd, always use correct charger.

No video on external screen but lights up 

So still no video

threads.title: 820-00165 No video
threads.message:
"test USB OSX with LED Link on MLB USB port"
Can you confirm 100% USB activity?

threads.title: 820-00165 No video
threads.message:
tested with my external drive and dont seems to read from it. just lights up not flashing as it should when it reads. An on psu the amps very stable at about 0.616 amp. 

its not no video it seems it wont start up as it should

threads.message:

do you have any for this board?
